title: UI: Rework Error Message
body_html:
The error messages should not be a huge text field as it is now, but just show how many errors you have and where. All error messages should be shown directly in the fields where the error accurs (this is already the case for some errors).

My proposal:

  • all errors need to be shown directly in the field where the error occurs
  • error messages should tell you where, that means in which tab the info is missing. This can be either:

    • in the summary:
      "

      About yourself

      error message

      About your project

      error message
      "

    • or shown in the tabs directly (e.g. by having a red border around the ones who have error messages, so you know where to look)

MUST FIX::

  • "4 errors to go before you can apply:" <- this is invisible (red on red).

NICE TO HAVE

  • change black on red writing to black on white writing and add only red border / or change font to red on white without a border.

body:
The error messages should not be a huge text field as it is now, but just show how many errors you have and where. All error messages should be shown directly in the fields where the error accurs (this is already the case for _some_ errors). 
### My proposal:
- [ ] all errors need to be shown directly in the field where the error occurs 
- [x] error messages should tell you **where**, that means **in which tab the info is missing**. This can be either:
  - in the summary:
    " 
    ### About yourself
    
    error message
    ### About your project
    
    error message
    "
  - or shown in the tabs directly (e.g. by having a red border around the ones who have error messages, so you know where to look)
    ![screen shot 2016-03-13 at 20 00 28](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/13730690/5a801944-e956-11e5-94af-3a291be85c0a.png)
### MUST FIX::
- [x] "4 errors to go before you can apply:" <- this is invisible (red on red).
### NICE TO HAVE
- [x] change black on red writing to black on white writing and add only red border / or change font to red on white without a border.
